title: Amex Unstaged Pharrell Williams Live at the Apollo
original_title: Amex Unstaged Pharrell Williams Live at the Apollo
overview: Pharrell performs for the "American Express Unstaged" music series, directed by Spike Lee, live streamed from The Apollo Theatre.
synopsis: Pharrell performs for the "American Express Unstaged" music series, directed by Spike Lee, live streamed from The Apollo Theatre.
